channel.title: CVE Feed for Intel Corporation -- Intel(R) Optane(TM) SSD DC P4800X
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Intel Corporation -- Intel(R) Optane(TM) SSD DC P4800X

item.title: CVE-2018-12166|2024-08-05T08:30:57.476Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20optane%28tm%29%20ssd%20dc%20p4800x
item.description: Insufficient write protection in firmware for Intel(R) Optane(TM) SSD DC P4800X before version E2010435 may allow a privileged user to potentially enable a denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12167|2024-08-05T08:30:59.244Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20optane%28tm%29%20ssd%20dc%20p4800x
item.description: Firmware update routine in bootloader for Intel(R) Optane(TM) SSD DC P4800X before version E2010435 may allow a privileged user to potentially enable a denial of service via local access.
